title: Police: 3-year-old Girl Accidentally Shoots Herself
content:
Columbia, SC (WLTX) - Authorities say a 3-year-old girl shot herself at a Columbia home Saturday morning.
The incident occurred at her home on the 100 block of East Lake Trail.
According to officers, preliminary information shows that the child found a loaded gun and accidentally shot herself in the leg.
Jennifer Timmons with Columbia Police Department says the bullet also grazed her hand.
She was transported to a local hospital and is in stable condition.
The Columbia Police Department Special Victims Unit is investigating this incident.
We will keep you updated as more information becomes available.
